pkgmetadata.longdescription: High-Dimensional Kernel Density Estimation and Geometry Operations // Estimates the shape and volume of high- dimensional datasets and performs set operations: intersection / overlap, union, unique components, inclusion test, and hole detection. Uses stochastic geometry approach to high- dimensional kernel density estimation. Builds n-dimensional convex hulls (polytopes). Can measure the n-dimensional ecological hypervolume and perform species distribution modeling.
